meanings.definition: To have dreamed more or better than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She outdreamt her friend by imagining flying in the sky.
meanings.sent2: He outdreamt all his classmates with his magical dream about unicorns.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outdreamt her brother by dreaming of a world made of candy.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity outdreamt reality as she envisioned a world where animals could talk.
meanings.sent5: His outdreamt adventures were so vivid that he woke up feeling like he had truly lived them.

meanings.sent1: She outdreamt about flying in her dream last night.
meanings.sent2: He outdreamt every night, creating new worlds in his sleep.
meanings.sent3: The cat outdreamt about chasing a giant mouse through the house.
meanings.sent4: His mind outdreamt the limitations of reality, exploring endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The artist's outdreamt visions inspired her to create beautiful paintings.
